dmca.title: [EV1-C2357578E] DMCA LevelServe Technologies
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 29, 2006 5:05 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2357578E] DMCA LevelServe Technologies

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

 (multipart/alternative)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
We have a copyright infringment issue with Kayako Infotech. Their
hosting information show they are on ThePlanet's network. 
 
Kayako has copied content from our website as seen here
http://forums.kayako.com/showpost.php?p=45313&postcount=12 
 
We have tried numerous times to resolve this with Kayako. They do not
repond. 
 
ThePlanet is liable for any copyright infringement complaints that are
not addressed in a timely manner. 
 
Our lawyer has advised us to send this email first as most issues are
easily resolved without the need for a written letter. 
 
If ThePlanet does require a written DCMA complaint from our lawyer,
please advise us where to send it. 
 
Thanks for your time,
Dale Brown
LevelServe Technolgies a Tennessee Company
866-390-3228
